TopicTitle: What is the use of BG fan shrouds?

Articles.Content:
https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/S-25_Fan_Shroud

Does it shield parts 'inside' or serve any other function?
It can help keeping your Kerbals from running into spinning fan blades. Some may also think that they look nice.
In terms of game mechanics, no, they don't really serve any purpose.  They just look nice.
